SAE is the acronym for "Society of automotive Engineers" which is a World Wide organization who set standards and validate automotive projects. 
 A student branch of this organization exists in UVCE. The motto of SAE-INDIA stands as ‘The Engineering Society for Advancing Mobility in Land Sea Air and Space’. GKDC (go-cart building championship), BAJA (Pronounced as BAHA, is an all-terrain vehicle building championship), SUPRA (Racing car building championship) are the main National Level competition organised by SAE. 
The student branch of SAE, ‘SAE-INDIA UVCE’ was set up in 2011 due to the earnest efforts of Mechanical Students of Batch 2009-2013. The club till date has involved in conducting many activities to benefit the members for improving their skills in the technical field. 
Team Em-power UVCE stood 6th (AIR) in GKDC and 124th(AIR) In BAJA which are the best figures till date in the history of its involvement.
